column1: A_Brickset_user,"2005-04-15T13:14:12Z","nice set ","it is a nice choice if you want to just relax and build lego for an hour. it is not challenging, but still fun to build. also it looks cute, well designed for a little model.
I want to add some opinions also about the site. (moderators can delete this part after reading:))

I am new to the site and it is brilliant. keep up the good work:) if you need any help, you can email to me, kinetica46@yahoo.com  but i can't go further than moderating, as long as I don't have web knowlegde or programming &lt

column2: medium sized tipper truck from Technic.
starts with the main chassis of the truck and the tipping mechanism.&nbsp
column3: It then proceeds to the cab section and finally the dumper bed.

column1: The truck looks good in the grey blue color scheme. The cab section is quite good looking. The dumping bed has a lot of open spaces and looks off a little bit... But the shaping is done well with the long flex rods. The steering is controlled by a gear on top of the cab as is the norm
column3: sets. The wheels over steer to touch the wheel arches some times but that is acceptable.&nbsp
column4: A gear to the side controls the tipper and has ample friction and realistic&nbsp

column1: This set is below average value for money as it has a low piece count. The functions are okay and work as expected. Another downside is the '
The functions are fun to play with.
The B- model is quite interesting being a road sweeper and has good functions.
On the whole this set is not bad but not something that is a must for any fan of Technic.
